public class Patcher
extends java.lang.Object

The patch patcher.

Chan Wai Shing

Pause or resume the patching.

Specified by:

Parameters:

newFile - the new file
destFile - the destination file
Throws:
java.io.IOException - error occurred when creating the new file

doOperation

protected ReplacementRecord doOperation(PatchRecord previousRecord,
                                        Patch.Operation operation,
                                        InterruptibleInputStream patchIn)
                                 throws java.io.IOException
Do the operation. 'remove', 'new' (folder only) and 'force' have no action to do here.

Parameters:
previousRecord - the previous operation record, null means no previous record
operation - the operation to do
patchIn - the stream to read in
Returns:
null if all succeed, a PatchRecord if replacement of files failed
Throws:
java.io.IOException - error occurred when doing operation

doPatch

public java.util.List<ReplacementRecord> doPatch(PatcherListener listener,
                                                 java.io.File patchFile,
                                                 int patchId,
                                                 AESKey aesKey,
                                                 java.io.File softwareDir,
                                                 java.io.File tempDir,
                                                 java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> destinationReplacement)
                                          throws java.io.IOException
Apply the patch.

Parameters:
listener - the listener to listen to patching event and information
patchFile - the patch file
patchId - the patch id
aesKey - the cipher key, null means no encryption used
softwareDir - the directory where the patch apply to
tempDir - the temporary directory to store the patched file
destinationReplacement - a map that used to replace the destination path in Operations in patchFile
Returns:
a list containing those failed replacement
Throws:
java.io.IOException - error occurred when doing patching

revert

public void revert()
            throws java.io.IOException
Revert the patching and restore to unpatched state.

Throws:
java.io.IOException - read log failed, or error occurred when doing revert (replacing file)

revert

protected void revert(PatchRecord patchRecord)
               throws java.io.IOException,
                      java.io.IOException
Revert the replacement according to patchRecord.

Parameters:
patchRecord - the patch record
Throws:
java.io.IOException - error occurred when doing revert (replacing file)

revertFile

protected void revertFile(PatchRecord patchRecord)
                   throws java.io.IOException
Throws:
java.io.IOException

clearBackup

public boolean clearBackup()
Remove all backup file in tempDir. Should invoke this after the patching succeed and status recorded.

Returns:
true if clear succeed, false if failed
